chunk_prompt: Summarize this content about Topic: didn, help, permanent:
final_prompt: Summarize this content about Topic: didn, help, permanent:

sentences.text: i. should not have read all of these right before bedtime.
my foot itches with a thousand cancers.
then, between work and their wife, the people around them pieced together that they could no longer read at the same level.
it wasn't their vision, it was their comprehension.
they couldn't even perceive what was actually wrong.

They couldn't even perceive what was actually wrong.
